snippet: Pierre Jackson had 24 points and 10 assists to lift Baylor into the National Invitation Tournament title game with a 76-70 win over Brigham Young at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Baylor defeats Brigham Young, 76-70, and Iowa beats Maryland, 71-60, to advance to National Invitation Tournament final; other men's college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pierre Jackson had 24 points and 10 assists to lift Baylor into the National Invitation Tournament title game with a 76-70 win over Brigham Young at Madison Square Garden.
